alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 9:26PM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent lake snows, with local amounts of 2 to 3 feet possible where bands persist the longest in the Watertown and northern Tug Hill areas. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions will be possible at times, especially tonight through Sunday. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. The heaviest snow will be across much of Jefferson County, northern and western Lewis County, and far northern Oswego County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. The band of heavy lake effect snow will oscillate north and south numerous times during this event with conditions varying over time. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible with deep snow cover on roads. Widespread blowing snow will reduce visibility to near zero in lake effect bands.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
